article.author: O'Sullivan Bere
article.title: The First Year of the Biden Presidency
article.text:
1. Will he last the term
  2. Will he do as promised
  3. Will he be scrutinised in the same manner as Trump was.
Click to expand...
So what ? I have absolutely no doubt that Joe Biden will not meet the expectations of many that voted for him simply on account of the fact that the enormous expectations are totally unrealistic, for example, in terms of immediately healing a bitterly-divided US. ==> That said, at approx. 1 pm US Eastern Time today Joe Biden will have already exceeded my expectations as I did not think he would win this earlier last year - and that we would have to endure 4 more years of the nightmare that the serial-lying, vicious, Orange-headed racist, supremacist skumbag Donald Trump as President of the US - and for that alone I will be eternally grateful to Joe Biden. Anything on top of that is bonus-territory. Well, we have not heard the last of Donald Trump - and I dearly look forward as the Southern District of New York go after him and - hopefully - bring him to justice.
 
" I was only a puppet, and so was Ulster and Ireland, in the political game that was to get the Tory Party into power. " - Eddie "the Gun Runner" Carson, 1921
Reactions:
